title: NA Speaker expresses sorrow over demise of Iftikhar Cheema
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 08 (APP): Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has expressed profound grief and sorrow over the demise of former Member National Assembly, Justice (Retd.) Iftikhar Ahmad Cheema.

In his condolence message, the Speaker conveyed heartfelt sympathy and condolences to the bereaved family, praying that Almighty Allah grant the departed soul eternal peace and give the family courage and patience to bear this irreparable loss.

The Speaker paid rich tribute to the late Justice (Retd.) Iftikhar Ahmad Cheema for his political and national services, saying that his contributions to public life and the nation will be remembered with respect. He added that the void left by his passing will be difficult to fill for a long time.
